story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_0100: N and Hugh must be ahead!
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_0300: We can’t let you go any further.
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_0400: The Shadow Triad will be your opponent.
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_0600:
I know you’re planning to head to that boy and
our lord N, but we must stop you here.
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_0800:
Oh, it’s been a while! Still can’t tell who’s 
who, but...
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_0900:
Colress... Why are you working with these people
who oppose Ghetsis?
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_1000:
Your role is to conduct research for Team
Plasma’s development.
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_1100:
Well excuse me! I scrapped my Team Plasma
title quite a while ago!
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_1200:
I am now purely a scientist who’s studying the
bond between humans and Pokémon!
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_1300:
And if you’re going to get in the way of that,
I must get rid of you!
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_1400: And on top of that, I hate Ghetsis!
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_1600: An enemy is an enemy, regardless the reason.
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_2200: They’re trying to buy time instead of beating us.
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_2300: What can we do? At this rate...
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_2500: Are you gonna help us? You’ve just recovered...
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_2800:
Wow! So this is what a Pokémon can do when it
cares for a Trainer!
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_2900:
You want to fight together, by my side? I really
appreciate that!
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_3000:
I didn’t want to ask you since Team Plasma has
put you through so much...
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_3100: But I want to help my friends.
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_3600:
We have to help N and Hugh! We can’t get caught
up here!
story_teamplasma_01_14000/2401_1001_3800:
I know... If it gets really tough, I might need
your help.
